welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Fitchburg, a charming city known for its beautiful landscapes and rich history. We hope you enjoy your stay and take some time to explore all that our city has to offer!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Municipal Airport serves domestic flights and features a variety of amenities for travelers.

terminals.name: International Terminal
terminals.description: The international terminal at Municipal Airport serves international flights and offers a range of services for international travelers.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport, no password required.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Boire Field Airport handles all commercial flights and includes amenities such as shops, restaurants, and baggage claim.

terminals.name: General Aviation Terminal
terminals.description: The general aviation terminal at Boire Field Airport is used for private and charter flights and includes a lounge and private check-in area.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Municipal Airport offers a variety of amenities and services for travelers.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Municipal Airport is used for shipping and receiving goods.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Hanscom Field Airport houses ticket counters, baggage claim, and security checkpoints.

terminals.name: Private Aviation Terminal
terminals.description: The private aviation terminal at Hanscom Field Airport caters to private and corporate aircraft, with luxurious amenities and services.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Manchester-boston Regional Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: South Terminal
terminals.description: The South Terminal at Manchester-boston Regional Airport is primarily used for regional flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
